param.name: backgroundColor
param.label: Flash object background color
param.description: Flash object background color. For example: #CCCCCC.

param.name: showPlay
param.label: Show Play/Pause Button
param.description: Selct yes or no to show or hide Play/Pause Button

param.name: autoScale
param.label: Auto Scale
param.description: Scale the full images and thumbs automatically

param.name: autoSlideTimer
param.label: Auto Slide Time
param.description: Auto slider time in seconds. Set 0(zero) to disable auto slider

param.name: pictureBoxColor
param.label: Thumb title bg color
param.description: Thumbnail title background color and image box color

param.name: TitleTextColor
param.label: Title color
param.description: Title font color with in description

param.name: short_desc
param.label: Show Description
param.description: Selct yes or no to show or hide Short Description

param.name: target
param.label: Traget Link
param.description: Where do you load the target url when user clicks on the link

param.name: catppv_flag
param.label: Fix IE cache bug
param.description: IE cache bug: Different instances of module shows only the first loaded category. If enabled different categories file names will be created for each instance.

param.name: onlyvm
param.label: Module appear in pages
param.description: all - will appear in every one page; VM category - will appear only in pages containing VM categories typed in Appear in id(s) parameter; VM Product - will appear only in pages containing VM products typed in Appear in id(s) parameter.

param.name: vmcat_id
param.label: Appear in id(s)
param.description: Enter comma seperated Category or Product Id(s) you would like module appear on pages containing this cateogies or products id. 0 for showing on all VM pages

param.name: showcorp
param.label: Show Categories or Products
param.description: Show Categories or Products with Id listed in Show Category/Product Id parameter. If set to Products please set Load current... parameter to no

param.name: category_id
param.label: Show Category/Product Id
param.description: Enter comma seperated Category or Product Id(s) you would like module to display. 0 - showing all products and all categories

param.name: images_path
param.label: Images Path
param.description: Contains the relative path to the images folder, which will be used by the final Flash. ex. images/stories/images/
